scripts.start: env-cmd .env.development npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.development npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.development react-scripts start
scripts.start:multi-charts: env-cmd .env.multiCharts npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.multiCharts npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.multiCharts react-scripts start
scripts.start:prod-local: env-cmd .env.prod.local npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.prod.local react-scripts start
scripts.start-nochart: env-cmd .env.development npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.development react-scripts start
scripts.build: env-cmd .env.production npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.production npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.production react-scripts build
scripts.build:pilot: env-cmd .env.pilot npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.pilot npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.pilot react-scripts build
scripts.build:dev: env-cmd .env.dev npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.dev npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.dev react-scripts build
scripts.build:uat: env-cmd .env.uat npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.uat npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.uat react-scripts build
scripts.build:qa: env-cmd .env.qa npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.qa npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.qa react-scripts build
scripts.build:preprod: env-cmd .env.preprod npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.preprod npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.preprod react-scripts build
scripts.build:excMock: env-cmd .env.excMock npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.excMock npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.excMock react-scripts build
scripts.build:multi-charts: env-cmd .env.multiCharts npm run chart_build && env-cmd .env.multiCharts npm run meta_file_generator && env-cmd .env.multiCharts react-scripts build
scripts.install_testing_packages: npm install cypress@8.7.0 cypress-image-snapshot babel-preset-react enzyme enzyme-adapter-react-16 redux-mock-store mocha mochawesome mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report-generator eslint-plugin-react --no-save
scripts.chart_build: cd chartiq-js-src && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:generate:report: npm run test:merge:reports && npm run test:create:html:report
scripts.test:dev:generate_cypress_report: (npm run test:run:dev && npm run test:generate:report) || npm run test:generate:report
scripts.test:qa:generate_cypress_report: (npm run test:run:qa && npm run test:generate:report) || npm run test:generate:report
scripts.test:uat:generate_cypress_report: (npm run test:run:uat && npm run test:generate:report) || npm run test:generate:report
